attributes.action: Stop the Destruction of the Countryside and protect every greenfield sites!
attributes.additional_details:
For decades we have financially used the countryside for money gains the government sold it off to developers! Communities have been betrayed and forced by the government to give up there farms and it’s created more divisions as there’s no sense of community! By stopping any more building works or development on fields. This means it will build better relations between this small community! 
Evidence is everywhere look where you live there’s building we are not thinking about the environment!
attributes.background: I am campaigning on this as I believe the countryside is dramatically decreasing over time and believe we the people should take care and appreciate we have. And the countryside is going every minute. It’s very important to me as I like to go for a lot of bike rides and walk around the countryside!
